channel.description: Recent content in Posts on PSC Newsletters

item.title: February 2024
item.description: It’s spring! Somebody tell the weather. Welcome to your new look Pennine Soaring Club newsletter! Every issue: Notes from the committee Name your newsletter The committee have come up with a few names we could call our newsletter but you get the deciding vote. Pick your favourite here and next month we’ll be back with a fancy new title. The Pennine Post The Parlick Press Wing Tips Safety Obligatory spring thermal warning.
